IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: MARYMOUNT COLLEGE WELCOMES STUDENTS OF ALL FAITHS AND BACKGROUNDS INTO A QUALITY,VALUES-BASED EDUCATION. WE FOSTER A STUDENT-CENTERED APPROACH TO LEARNING THAT PROMOTES THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE WHOLE PERSON.
IRS990.MissionDescription: MARYMOUNT COLLEGE WELCOMES STUDENTS OF ALL FAITHS AND BACKGROUNDS INTO A QUALITY,VALUES-BASED EDUCATION. WE FOSTER A STUDENT-CENTERED APPROACH TO LEARNING THAT PROMOTES THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE WHOLE PERSON.
IRS990.Description: INSTRUCTION -THE COLLEGE SERVED APPROXIMATELY 544 FTE COLLEGE STUDENTS IN FISCAL YEAR 2009-2010. IT ALSO SERVED APPROXIMATELY 1,315 HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS IN BEVERLY HILLS, BURBANK & ETC SCHOOL DISTRICT IN SUMMER OF 2009.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NO REVIEW WAS OR WILL BE CONDUCTED.

THE COLLEGE'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEWS PERIODICALLY THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION PACKAGE. IN ITS CONSIDERATION, THE BOARD REVIEWS DATA PROVIDED BY SUCH ORGANIZATION AS ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT CALIFORNIA COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES AS WELL AS OTHER DATA SOURCE.
NO DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FINANCIAL AID OR GOVERNMENT ASSISTANCE EXPLANATION
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE COLLEGE ADMINISTERS FEDERAL GOVERMENT FINANCIAL AID TO ITS STUDENTS, THE COLLEGE IS ALSO THE FISCAL AGENT OF PROJECT GRAD LOS ANGELES, THE RECIPIENT OF GEAR-UP FUNDS FROM THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION

FORM 990, PART VI, LINE 10 - ORGANIZATIONS PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990 NO. HOWEVER, THE DATA REPORTED IN THIS RETURN REFLECT INFORMATION TAKEN FROM THE COLLEGE'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AUDITED BY AN INDEPENDENT AUDITING FIRM. THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WERE REVIEWED BY MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AT THEIR AUDIT COMMITTE MEETING HELD ON NOV. 10, 2010
